meanings.definition: To undo the laying of (a rope)
meanings.sent1: She was unlaying the rope to fix the knot.
meanings.sent2: The sailor unlaying the rope to prepare for docking.
meanings.sent3: The magician unlaying the rope trick left the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: His words were unlaying the tightly wound emotions within her.
meanings.sent5: The act of unlaying the rope was like unwinding a tangled mess.

meanings.sent1: He was unlaying the paint from the wall to reveal the original color.
meanings.sent2: The chef unlaying the onion's layers for the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The cat unlaying the blankets on the bed made a cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: Time was unlaying the memories, revealing the truth hidden beneath.
meanings.sent5: The process of unlaying the layers of soil exposed the archaeological findings.
